description:
Paired with a paddling top, these bibs prov ide versatile protection for touring kayakers and canoeists. Integrated socks keep everything below your armpits dry. Once you’re aboard, the breathable fabric ensures comfort through a full day of strokes.

  • MarineSpec™ waterproof-breathable fabric is designed for salt-water environments
  • Knees and seat are reinforced with a burly 500D Cordura® fabric
  • Articulated knees and inseam gusset for a great fit and ease of movement
  • Kangaroo hand warmer pockets are lined with fleece
  • Shoulder straps are adjustable for a customized fit
  • Zippered chest pocket offers easy access to essentials
name: Mustang Survival Taku Dry Bib Pants - Men's
